授業の概要・背景: In addition to teacher instruction, students will work individually, with partners, in small groups and in whole class activities to develop communication skills, and engage in independent/group research for oral or written assignments.
授業方法: After each face-to-face lesson, review each lesson and complete the regular homework assignments in order to be prepared for the following class.  In general, there will be two textbook classes and one project class each week.
